properties.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 6 at 2:26AM MST until January 6 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter of a mile in dense fog.

* WHERE...Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will drop visibilities quickly in a
short distance. Visibilities may become severely restricted near
rivers, lakes, bridges, and low lying areas. Icy conditions may
also develop, especially along bridges and overpasses.
properties.instruction:
If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of
distance ahead of you.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING
